reviewText: I'm a die heart Lyoko fan, I have the book and this DVD vol now just need to get vol 1 and 2 :)
It arrived on time and in great condition. It played well and enjoyed it.  Thank you.

My sons recently got into Code Lyoko and love it!  They wished there was an episode listing on this page so here they are:

Episodes in Code Lyoko Volume 3

"Image Problem"

"Ghost Channel"

"Swarming Attack"

"Log Book"

Bonus Episode = "The Robots"

Truely worth buying. This show is unbeliveable.

  Signed:

  ~John Stuart Thompson~
